answers.answer: Hi there,Your brother’s cholesterol levels are on the higher side. It is possible that he is suffering from fatty liver. In fatty liver there is fat in the liver, along with inflammation and damage. Fatty liver due to alcoholism is called Alcoholic fatty liver disease and the other one is Nonalcoholic fatty liver disease, which is due to obesity, diabetes and high triglyceride levels. Lifestyle changes, avoiding alcohol and weight reduction can help. Consult your doctor for more queries and assistance since he knows your medical history best. I hope it helps.Best wishes and kind regards!
